channel.title: Thinking about making RSinterface maker
channel.description: Im currently in the making of a Interface Maker just have the basic stuff right now but may be able to be able to select different server/client versions and output the code accordingly, just an idea and was wondering if anyone might want me to release it. [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/52706709/Pic1.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/52706709/Pic2.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/52706709/Pic3.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/52706709/pic4.png[/img]

item.title: Thinking about making RSinterface maker
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

tf happened here?

nobody is gonna force you to use this or any other “tool” / server etc. on this site.

@op. if it helps you, use it. if you think it will help others, release it.
just please, for the sake of all that is good, improve it. the ui is messy/limited. the code is ugly tbh…

also, if you plan to release it-be open source

Read full topic

item.title: Thinking about making RSinterface maker
item.dc:creator: @naseem142 naseem142
item.description:
@naseem142 wrote:

Why do you guys have to be like that? lol

OT: I think it’s good that you got experience from making this and maybe it will help out other RSPS beginner coders.
Won’t be using it but others might…

Read full topic

item.title: Thinking about making RSinterface maker
item.dc:creator: @joeyulanch joeyulanch
item.description:
@joeyulanch wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:15, topic:548674”][quote author=joeyulanch link=topic=667581.msg4464674#msg4464674 date=1419371815]

No it’s not like that it wasn’t a question either it was a statement like this:
"classroom say “I” If you want to suck my horserus Cockerus"
Note: everyone but one person says “I” and the one person that didn’t does nothing.

That’s not what you asked though.
You asked a yes or no question.
[s]

Phrasing is important when you ask a question, or say anything you expect a response from.
Also, who’s to say the “one kid that did nothing” didn’t say “NAY” instead? or say a third party response like “That’s a stupid idea”. Since everyone is entitled to their opinion.

Also, you never answered my question.[s]

Exactly you finally got I don’t want that “kid who didn’t suck my horserus peniserus”'s opinion This post is for people who want to suck my horserus peniserus. go post somewhere where they want All different kinds of feedback and want ways to improve their whatever by telling them it’s shit. It 's like telling a baby in the womb its penis is small when it hasnt even been born i don’t need feedback on an developing idea.
[/quote]
Yes, you do actually need feedback as you’re developing. So your end product doesn’t turn out like shit. Lol
Because, as you can tell based on the responses already in the thread, your end product WILL turn out like shit.[/quote]

I’m no where near the point of needing feedback everything that has been mentioned about fixing something is obvious fixes that would have been made i’m just setting a base right now once I actually get somewhere I’ll need feedback. I’m in the middle of banging my grandma the baby isn’t close to being developed I don’t need feedback

Read full topic

item.title: Thinking about making RSinterface maker
item.dc:creator: @joeyulanch joeyulanch
item.description:
@joeyulanch wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:11, topic:548674”][quote author=joeyulanch link=topic=667581.msg4464661#msg4464661 date=1419369042]

[quote author=joeyulanch link=topic=667581.msg4464642#msg4464642 date=1419361440] Yes I did ask for opinions on whether anyone would like me to release this not if they didn’t want me to release so get off my post.

If you ask for our opinions on whether or not you should release it, you get both ends. You didn’t say “I only want POSITIVE opinions on this” or anything similar. Even if you did, that’d only make more backlash.
Learn to take feedback or don’t post.
[/quote]
If only you guys could read the description I’m looking for people who want me to release I’m not looking for people who don’t want me to release.
Learn how to read or don’t post.
[/quote]
I don’t care what you’re looking for. You need to learn how to take feedback. You should be happy that people tell you why it’s bad, that way you can improve it.

When you ask a yes or no question, you have to expect both the YES and the NO.

You asked:

just an idea and was wondering if anyone might want me to release it.

Which has 2 responses.
Yes and no.

And as you can tell, so far the community said no.

I’ve got a question for you:
Should you jump off a bridge?
Note: I only expect POSITIVE responses. No one is allowed to say no because I said so. YOU HAVE TO ANSWER YES.[/quote]

No it’s not like that it wasn’t a question either it was a statement like this:
"classroom say “I” If you want to suck my horserus Cockerus"
Note: everyone but one person says “I” and the one person that didn’t does nothing.

Read full topic

[/quote]
If you ask for our opinions on whether or not you should release it, you get both ends. You didn’t say “I only want POSITIVE opinions on this” or anything similar. Even if you did, that’d only make more backlash.
Learn to take feedback or don’t post.
[/quote]
If only you guys could read the description I’m looking for people who want me to release I’m not looking for people who don’t want me to release.
Learn how to read or don’t post.[/quote]
I don’t care what you’re looking for. You need to learn how to take feedback. You should be happy that people tell you why it’s bad, that way you can improve it.

When you ask a yes or no question, you have to expect both the YES and the NO.

You asked:

just an idea and [u]was wondering if anyone might want me to release it.[/u]
Which has 2 responses. Yes and no.

And as you can tell, so far the community said no.

I’ve got a question for you:
Should you jump off a bridge?
Note: I only expect POSITIVE responses. No one is allowed to say no because I said so. YOU HAVE TO ANSWER YES.

Read full topic

item.title: Thinking about making RSinterface maker
item.dc:creator: @joeyulanch joeyulanch
item.description:
@joeyulanch wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:5, topic:548674”]Please no, the program is extremely proprietary to a single client, the GUI is poorly put together, and you couldn’t even be bothered to promote good use of code conventions in the ugly code you provide to create the interface. Please don’t release this.[/quote] its just an idea right now I basically haven’t even started and like i said if you would have read the description if anyone actually wanted me to release which looks doubtful now i would make it for a wider range of clients/servers, and code provided in the finish form is structured the same as it is in the client i’m using if that’s what you were talking about also I’m new to coding and did not even think about make the GUI look good at all because it’s just an idea right now and I don’t give a shit what it looks like just making it work.

did you not ask for opinions? if you wanted everyone to grovel and say “yes please release it” you should of just said that I wouldn’t of posted.
Yes I did ask for opinions on whether anyone would like me to release this not if they didn’t want me to release so get off my post.

Read full topic
